title: Ungodly.
body: From the time I looked at this app, I thought it was going to be like driving a real car. Apparently it was not. The vehicle does not even COAST like a real VW Touareg would. Instead you have to have this mechanism that acts as if you are touching the brake pedal. BUMMER! And the steering is atrocious in this game. It does not go around corners properly, leading me to hit the curb on some corners. Overall, it was TERRIBLE!!!!!!!

title: Good (slippery) game!
body: I disagree with the guy several reviews below me - I think VW's games are a great idea that hasn't been really tried by other automakers. The game engine is good, and the Touareg's unusually (and hopefully unrealistically) tail-happy behavior makes for some great replay videos. If you want to catch up on your countersteering, try this app!

title: Simple but enjoyable :-)
body:
First, ... the name shown, Jaded user, does not apply to this App.
I can't see where to change it, it was for a terminal program purchased, I didn't like, but now I'm stuck with this name for all my reviews.  :-|

Anyway, this simple racing game is enjoyable.
Some say it crashes, but not on the iPad2, it actually runs very smoothly, without crashing at all.  :-)

The racing surfaces do make a difference to how the car acts on it, so each weather condition will be different outcomes.

You may get good at it fast, or it may take a bit of time to master, but it's still going to be enjoyable to play with now and again, when you have nothing else to do.

Don't expect it to be as the fancy racing games are, it's just a small App to pass some extra time you find yourself with, and enjoy the time used racing with it.

Have fun!

title: Simple

title: Can't believe it's only the lite version
body: This just can't be the lite version. It is totally packed with levels that can keep you going for a while without getting bored with it. Downloading it is like getting a crazy big discount. The graphics are awesome, and the automatic replay with different camera views is great. If you want a fun racing game with realistic graphics and lots of levels, download this App. I highly recommend it!

title: Not bad
body: This game is pretty good, except for a few problems. This game has horrible graphics when you play it with an iPad with the zoom on 1x. I also don't know why the last level is in a thunderstorm, because I don't think when you're driving, there's really a difference between rain and storms. I would also like a camera view inside the cabin of the Touareg, and a racing option where you can race other people. I also think there should be more levels. Another weird thing is at the end of each level when it shows a replay of how you driven, when the side of the car is right in front of the camera, you might notice that there isn't actually a person in the drivers seat. I also think the game is a bit too easy, but overall, this game was okay. :)?

title: Free and this good, is it true?
body:
It's true it's FREE and 5 stars amazing. Just about the best driving game for the iPhone in graphics, level design, and control feel. The only real problem is the lack of levels there are only really 3 individual ones 6 in total but half are identical with little difference. 

Bottom line: it's a must play! Free so why wouldn't you download it?

title: Amazing game, and it's free!
body: Nice job on this game! When I first saw it I thought it would be at least a couple bucks, and was pleasantly surprised when I saw it was free! Amazing graphics, very responsive controls, and excellent, realistic physics. Nice work. The only reason it's not 5 stars is because it doesn't have much in it in the means of races, but it has quite a lot more than I expected for the price. Again, excellent job!

title: Great app
body: This app is very worth the minute it takes to download. It's free and you should buy it while it's still free! Graphics are very nice but the game itself doesn't have many tracks. In normal mode you get 6 tracks to race on. In economy mode you get the same  tracks but there is a different kind of playing environment. Cars are very well customizable with 6 different wheels and 6 different colors to choose from... That means there's 206 different ways your car could look like! I highly reconmend this app!

title: Really cool
body:
This app is really cool and would be fun for all ages. The special affects are great and the challenge is too. It's definitely not one of those games that is really easy and bores you easily. The only thing I would have to say is that the car doesn't steer that easily so I would suggest putting the steering sensitivity to 1 under the control settings. So, in conclusion, this app is great and guess what?! It's free! So buy it! Have fun and congrats to the Volkswagen company for an amazing app!

~applicious

title: Good for free
body:
I got this game when I saw it top the charts for free racing games.  Once I started playing it, I decided to write a review.....
Overall the game is a little bland....it needs more variety..ie. more cars more levels etc.  The controls are simple to learn and basically the same as any other racing game worth your while.  The cars slide a lot on turns and you can't curb-hop so it's harder to drive without bumping into something.  There are six levels with varying weather (the thunderstorms are beautiful) and roads...it is oddly satisfying going over bumps on motocross style gravel roads...but there is no plot or incentive to win.  The cheesy enviro-geek mode is where you have to conserve as much fuel as possible....that made me want to barf when I played it.  Taking into account that there is one car you can drive, six maps that vary slightly, and a poor soundtrack, I gave this game three stars.  It's good for free but not worth anything more than nothing.

title: Nice promo for the new Touareg.
body: A fun, free distraction. Good looking game, good fun. I had a lot of fun with the Scirocco R challenge game, and this was no different. I feel that VW is appealing to the wrong market, though, because most people who play iPhone games don't exactly have the $50,000 to pony up for one of these babies. But I've seen the Touareg in action, and it's a really amazing car. Anyway, fun game, and it's free, so give it a go.

title: Very, very good
body:
"Volkswagen Touareg Challenge" is a great rally game with amazing graphic, sounds and music. And it's FREE!

PROs:

- Great graphic (car models, locations)
- Variety of weather conditions (storm looks great)
- Car physics
- Good music and SFX
- Two different modes of rally championship
- Time Trial
- Car customization (color, rims)
- FREE

CONs:

- A little too short... But why to complain if it's free? :)

Highly recommended!
